name: Philippe Rebillard
description:
I am looking to meet open and happy people. Love yourself and life. Are you willing to share and enjoy life together? I am easy going, love the outdoors, I enjoy theatre and also to get into the car and drive. Lets meet and chat a bit. I am at a very good place in my life and would like to share in the fruits of our labors.
I’m one of those guys that is not in a hurry, I like to do things at the spur of the moment, that might be going for a ride on my motorcycle go to the shopping mall, which is rare.
I do like to sit at home and watch movies, documentaries, especially about space or nature. I like to cook and I’m not bad at it. However, sometimes it would be nice to have someone cook for me. Sometimes I stay up late. Sometimes I go to better there’s no real sense schedule.
